questions.question: GMT Master is available in full plastic
questions.fact: GMT Master is available in only steel and gold

questions.question: Rolex Daytona is the entry level for Rolex Watches
questions.fact: Daytona is one of the most iconic and expensive lineup from Rolex

questions.question: React technology is developed by Facebook
questions.fact: React was created by Jordan Walke, a software engineer at Facebook.
